content.description:
You will read a selection in Chinese. Each selection is accompanied by a question(s) in English. For each question, choose the response that is best according to the selection. Chinese texts appear here in both traditional and simplified characters.
Read this public sign.
(Traditional characters)
為了獅子的健康，請勿投餵食物

(Simplified characters)
为了狮子的健康，请勿投喂食物
content.question: What is the purpose of the sign?

choices.label: To encourage people to eat healthy food
To warn against consuming spoiled food
To call attention to new food choices
To discourage an improper use of food

content.answer: To discourage an improper use of food

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives
